about_the_game:
"Lifters & Heartbreakers" is an intense 2D side-scrolling shooter set in the war-torn world of Pavlovia. Players follow the harrowing journey of three elite soldiers from the Hunter Unit—Lynch, Hirschmann, and Bishop—who must fight for their survival after their helicopter crash-lands deep within enemy territory. Stranded behind enemy lines, they soon uncover a deadly plot: a rebel faction led by the cunning Pavlovian sniper officer Sasha is on the brink of deploying a nuclear weapon.

As players navigate through hostile terrain, they must rely on quick reflexes and tactical skill to overcome waves of enemies, sabotage rebel operations, and stop the nuclear threat before it’s too late. With fast-paced combat, unique character abilities, and a gripping narrative set against the backdrop of a global conflict, "Lifters & Heartbreakers" delivers a thrilling gameplay experience where every bullet counts.

Can you outsmart Sasha and his forces, and prevent the ultimate disaster?
